1   package org.kohsuke.args4j;
2   
3   import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
4   
5   import org.junit.Before;
6   import org.junit.Test;
7   
8   /**
9    * Some tests for the {@link ProxyOptionHandler} using multi-level proxies
10   * 
11   * @author Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
12   *
13   */
14  public class ProxyOptionsDepthTest {
15  	static class ObjectWithOptions2 {
16  		@Option(name = "-r", required = true)
17  		int value;
18  	}
19  
20  	static class ObjectWithOptions {
21  		@Option(name = "-opt2", handler = ProxyOptionHandler.class)
22  		OptionsEnum2 options = OptionsEnum2.FIRST;
23  		Object optionsOp;
24  	}
25  	
26  	enum OptionsEnum2 implements CmdLineOptionsProvider {
27  		FIRST {
28  			@Override
29  			public Object getOptions() {
30  				return new ObjectWithOptions2();
31  			}
32  		},
33  		SECOND {
34  			@Override
35  			public Object getOptions() {
36  				return new Object();
37  			}
38  		}
39  		;
40  	}
41  	
42  	enum OptionsEnum implements CmdLineOptionsProvider {
43  		FIRST {
44  			@Override
45  			public Object getOptions() {
46  				return new ObjectWithOptions();
47  			}
48  		},
49  		SECOND {
50  			@Override
51  			public Object getOptions() {
52  				return new Object();
53  			}
54  		}
55  		;
56  	}
57  	
58  	class OptionsHolder {
59  		@Option(name = "-opt", required = false, handler = ProxyOptionHandler.class)
60  		OptionsEnum opt = OptionsEnum.FIRST;
61  		Object optOp;
62  	}
63  	
64  	OptionsHolder options;
65  	CmdLineParser parser;
66  	
67  	/**
68  	 * Setup
69  	 */
70  	@Before
71  	public void setup() {
72  		options = new OptionsHolder();
73  		parser = new CmdLineParser(options);
74  	}
75  	
76  	/**
77  	 * Should throw because OptionsEnum2.FIRST has a required field 
78  	 * 
79  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
80  	 */
81  	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
82  	public void testHandler1() throws CmdLineException {
83  		parser.parseArgument();
84  	}
85  	
86  	/**
87  	 * test defaults with required -r
88  	 * 
89  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
90  	 */
91  	@Test
92  	public void testHandler2() throws CmdLineException {
93  		parser.parseArgument("-r", "1");
94  		assertEquals(1, ((ObjectWithOptions2)((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp).optionsOp).value);
95  	}
96  	
97  	/**
98  	 * Should throw because OptionsEnum2.FIRST has a required field 
99  	 * 
100 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
101 	 */
102 	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
103 	public void testHandler3() throws CmdLineException {
104 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST");
105 	}
106 	
107 	/**
108 	 * Should pass 
109 	 * 
110 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
111 	 */
112 	@Test
113 	public void testHandler4() throws CmdLineException {
114 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-opt2", "SECOND");
115 	}
116 	
117 	/**
118 	 * Should throw because of missing field
119 	 * 
120 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
121 	 */
122 	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
123 	public void testHandler5() throws CmdLineException {
124 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-opt2", "FIRST");
125 	}
126 	
127 	/**
128 	 * Should pass
129 	 * 
130 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
131 	 */
132 	@Test
133 	public void testHandler6() throws CmdLineException {
134 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-opt2", "FIRST", "-r", "1");
135 		assertEquals(1, ((ObjectWithOptions2)((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp).optionsOp).value);
136 	}
137 	
138 	/**
139 	 * Should pass (using defaults for -opts2)
140 	 * 
141 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
142 	 */
143 	@Test
144 	public void testHandler7() throws CmdLineException {
145 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-r", "1");
146 		assertEquals(1, ((ObjectWithOptions2)((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp).optionsOp).value);
147 	}
148 }
